text: ee dharmdeshanawa bohodenata sarththka wiya.

mema wadasatahanedi amana thakaful rakshana samagama magin lankiya samajaya wetha dayada karana lada rakshana kshetha්raye pawa agayimatada sammanayatada patha්rawu rakshana sewawan dekak pilibanda mahajanathawa danuwath karana ladi.

me karuna nisa nithara awadi wa nokada wa dewiyan wahansege siyalu senanga udesa, yachnya karanna. 19 suba asne abirahasa prakasha karana pinisa, katha karana koyi witath, nirbhaya wa ese kirime shakthiya mata labena lesa yachnya karanna. 20 siragatha wa sitina mama, ee suba asna wenuwen thanapathiyek wemi.

apa me prashnaya boho kalakata pera tharamak sakachcha kara athi namuth eya nawathath sandahan kirime waradak natha.

wisarjana panath ketumpatha (aya-waya) 2015 wenuwen karaka sabha awasthawe wiwadaya sandaha wen kala dina 17n 10 wani dinaya wana ada (14) amathyansha dekaka waya shirshayan sammatha kara ganima sandaha parlimenthu wiwadaya pawath we.

ganga ihala samuha jagath janapi්rayaaacharya mandalaya.daham pasal daru dariyangen kotasaknawalapitiya ganga ihala pradeshiya lekam kottasaye polmalagama gramaniladhari wasame warakawala dodamwala dehigasthanna shri gunalankarama wiharaye pihiti shri soratha daham pasala dushkara gammana rasaka daruwanta aashirwadayak wi thibe.2012 janawari 22 dina pupurassa shri subramaniyam wiharaya ha kohowala shri pi්rayadarshanaramaya warakawala shri gunalankara wiharadhipathi karagala soratha na himiyan saha dayaka sabhawe apakapa wimen mema daham pasala arambaana ladi.

ude pandarama wadata yannath wuna !

naya yamata pathwu wakawanuwedi jathika godanagili paryeshana sanwidhanaya, peradeniya wishwa widyalaya, aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaya athulu aayathana gananawak kala paryeshanawaladi yali mema pradeshaya awadanam wiya haki yayi janathawa danuwath kota thibe.naya yamath samaga siya gammanawala linwala jala dharithawa adu wi athi bawath atham lin sampurnayenma sidi giya bawa da gamwasin pawasayi.
tharuna parapura deshapalanagnyayin pitupasa rakiya illagena eema api awasan kala yuthuyi.
ee kiyanne sachinita aayema pemwathiya wenna barida?
mokada chil eke biyar ekak bila, ape thaleta hadapu chayinis kama tikak ehema kala enna puluwan thanakne.
ekama denima ha wenath kalisamak masa deka thunak patta gasa andina gihan kamisa thoranne wada kilitu adu eka washayeni.
ee nisa athiwuna randuwa kelawara wune parak dekak wadila.

miya gos aththe halawatha ,ilippadeniya - kanukatiya padinchikariyaka wana halawatha aananda jathika pasale igenuma labamin siti kaushalya pawithrani(19) namathi pasal sisuwiya bawa halawatha maha rohal prakashakayek kiya sitiyeya.

nawathama jayarupa ekathuwan (02/21) sonu nigam dalanda maligawa wandapuda gani "pasugiya wasara ekahamara kalaya thulama mage mawa tharamak asanipa thaththwayen siti bawa saha aya math samaga shri lankawata paminimata apekshawen siti bawa, mata palamuwenma kiyanna wuwamana wuna.
wenath bayinari brokarlata wada meke krama godak sapayala thiyenawa tred karanna numuth api hodayi kiyala hithena saha pawichchi karanna pahasu eewa tika balamu.

ee antha deka prathikshepa kara chathuskotika nyayata anuwa gatha haki ek sthawarayak nam sapekshawath nirapekshawath pawathi yannaya.

uthure tharuna paramparawatath dakune tharuna paramparawata sema siyalu pahasukam sapaya di thikhenawa.o wirakiyawa nathi kirimath jenaral nidahas kara ganimath kala hakiwanne ejape aandu balayak yatathe pamanayi di eksath jathika peramuna idiripath kota thibenawa.
bohoma sthuthiyi yashodha saho sinhala upasirasiyata.

eya sadharana agayimakata lak nowima kanagatuwata karunaki.

ithamath hodata hithala keti lipiyakin warga kirimanam niyamayi.ooka thamayi sathyaya.

me langadi mage blogaya athurudan wuna .
dina 100kin aththatama matanan hithena widiyata adithalamak dana eka thamayi karanna puluwan.
ruhunu wishwa widyalayiya widyayathanaya mathara madawaththedi 1978 agosthu 27 aarambha karana ladde janadhipathi je.aar. jayawardhana wisini.
eekata kiyanne wayo dhathu kiyala.
kumaruta chathurarya sathyaya purna washayen ma awabodha wuna.

deshapalana ha aarthika washayen anthayatama pirihuunu ratak bawata sha්ri lankawa jathyantharawa pawa awamanayata lakwiya.

aananda wakkumbaura wisini, 2019 desambar 6 tramp goliya welanda yuddhaya uthsanna karayi “ee pilibandawa mathiwaranayen pasuwa salaka balimata ma kamathiya” yanuwen tramp pawasuwe, chinaya samanga welanda giwisumak athikaraganima pilibandawa awasan dinayak aththe dayi landanayedi ohugen asana lada prashnayakata pilithuru washayeni.
janathawa kiwe sayitam waidya widyalaya ahosi ho janasathu karanna.

nawa ganudenu karuwo yuropa sangamayen iwath wuwoth brithanyaye nawa welanda ganudenu naga situwime aramuna peradari karagena kriya karana nawa aarthika wisheshagnya kandayamak path kirime salasum pasugiya sathiye brithanya rajaya wisin niwedanaya kara thibe.
ma piliganna bududahama ha thunwani sangayanawe hewath ashoka bududahama athara wenaskam atha.

oba abbahiwi athi kola warga panayen midi nirogi saukhya sampanna bima wargayak panaya thulin obata mathuwana wehesa, pipasaya kshanikawa niwagatha hakiya.
an ayage eewath huwamaru kara ganimu!

maitha්ripala, pe්ramakirthi da alwis wannawun madhya hasirawimedi owun bhawitha kala bhasha kaushalyaya saha owunge ha`da palanaya pa්rawruththiyaka athi watinakama ha sinhala bhashawe praudathwaya manawin pe්rakshakayanta danena lesa pa්rakasha kalaha.

eeye pereda ee katha baha wadath unusumwa nawatha ahanna labune natasha muhunu pothata ekathu karapu chayarupa kipayak nisa.

kiyannata nam danne natha.
athata aragenath aapahu thiyala aawa.
samasthayak washayen aya pakshaya naraka natha.
meyasu ge darshanika wyapruthiya saransha kala haki ek aakarayak wanne kalaya pilibandawa hegaliyanu prawadayata haidagar saha derida dakwu prathicharaya ikmawa yama lesayi.
gedaradi thamayi pawichchi karanne....., mama hithanne sar unath, meheta enakota eeka almariye dala enawa aththe......
emagin siya diwi hanikara ganimata pera sithiya ුyutha de pawa diwayina puwathpatha wisin alewiyata thiba thibe.
rusiyan samaja prajathanthrawadi kamkaru pakshaye wyawasthawa ketumpath kirima sandaha thora ganna lada kamituwe wadawalatada ohu sahabhagi wiya.
sigarat pakattuwe kawaraye siyayata 80 ka idak rupamaya anathuru angawimak sandaha wen kirime anumathiya ape parlimenthuwe eekamathikawa sammatha wiya.

suranga lakmalge 5wani oowarayedi kadulu 2k da, ajantha mendisge siwuwani oowarayedi kadulu 2kda binda watima thiranathmaka wiya.me tharagaye kasiye wasiya dinagath anjalo mathiws mulin panduwata paharadimata thiranaya kala athara dilshan ha kusal janith perera inima aarambha kaleya.me tharagawaliey mulma tharagayata kandawu kusal pererata thama sthanaya raka ganimata labunu mahagu awasthawak apathe yawamin lakunu 9kata dawi giye shri lanka palamu kadulla lakunu 13di satahan karamini.shri lankawata dawantha lakunu pramanayak kara yamata maga padu dilshan-thirimanna dewani kadulle sambandhathawa lakunu 163k wu athara lahiru thirimanna pandu 93kadi haye paharak ha hathare pahara 6k samaga lakunu 68k laba thama haya wani ekdina ardha shathakaya wartha kaleya.
eekayi apita aැthi ekama sathuta....
age manasa sahallu wi athi bawak mata dane.
dayakantha perera mahatha da mehi siti..
mayi 15 wanidayin pasuwa palath palana aayathanawala nila kalaya awasan wenawa.
ese wuwada ema kumanthranaya asarthaka bawath, janathawa mema kumanthranakarinta erehiwa widi basiya yuthu bawath, thurki janadhipathi risep thayip erdogan pawasuweya.
hisa nathi mayik ge chayarupa suprakata tayims sagarawe pawa palawa thibenawa.
mage nam supurudu widiyata me wathaweth danissath, walalu karath asanipa wuna.

mokawathma nathnam kohe hari dipankareka gahana krikat mach ekak dagena, uda pana pana eeka balayi.
ape ratata oya jara nithiya genawoth oya jara saththu maranawa.
hitapu krikat nayaka imran khan warthamanaye erata janapriya deshapalana charithayak bawata pathwa atha.

karya bhara thapal sthanadhipathi ha ansha bhara pradhanin thama wagakima ha karyabharaya thapal sthanadhipathi athpotha, thapal regulasi saha rajya sewakayinta adala widhiwidhana anuwa katuyuthu kala yuthu bawa da awadharanaya karana bawa thapalpathiwaraya nikuth kala niwedanaye wadiduratath sandahan ya.

gathin pamanak noweyi pahadili manasakin da ohuta sawan denna…

ohu pawasuwe lankawe prashnawalata batahira agili nogasiya yuthu bawath pil bedim walin thora samadena eeta ekwiya yuthu bawathya.
nisi wada piliwalak kriyathmaka nokara hudu deshapalana wasi thaka prakasha nikuth karanna epa, paribhogika ayithin surakime jathika wyaparayen krushikarma amathyawarayata lipiyak..

ehenam eya sihinayak noweyi.
ee kale lamayinge adhyapana katayuthu walata ada wage unanduwak thibune na.
ape hama hamuwikama sundara awasanaya
eeth uu dipu kata kadichchi uththaren mage bada papuwa aayeth danna gaththa .
honda hithin gihin hitapan mage hira kuduwe..

thama sanwidhanaya kisindu awasthawaka prachanda kriya sandaha anubala nodun bawa sandahan karana un wahanse, pasugiya wasara kihipaya pura siduwu prachandakari siduwim gana swadhina komishamak pathkota niwaradiwa nithiya kriyathmaka karana lesa baladharingen illa sitithi.
ee de hariyata thama me rate hugadenekta awabodha wela na.
ee rateth klabwala gi gayana eka thamayi mage wruththiya wune.
ape samajaye bohomayak pawul ihirenna eda wagema adath nandamma leli gatuma hethuwana awastha nathuwa noweyi.
udani manejarge kakul wala bath kenda hariyen allagena thamayi thamange puka natawanne.
oya thilapiyata witharayi ape thaththa wesa kolla kiyala nokiwe.
dan thamayi ape mathrukawa patan ganne.oya widiyata analog sistam ekakin
daruwan sandaha drawya pariksha karanna).
kisima deyak nokara innawata wada umbaala karana widhiyata hari karana eka loku deyak kiyala mama hithanne.
oyage maha loku thathwe witharayi oyata loku.
dan eeta wiwidha prathichara labenawa.

mema drawida jathikayan dasa denata erehiwa pawathina nadu wibhaga awasan wu pasu owunage kamaththa paridi ratin pitawa yamata awasaraya labadimata thamilnadu rajaya katayuthu yoda thibuna da indiyawema thawaduratath randi sitimata owun awasaraya illa thibini.
me siyalla hellayak daragena innawa
ape sharira wadiwena ushnathwayata oroththu denne na
uththama sadu ee wage helikoptarayaka yana kenek.

eda sunami rala panadura wanasana wita, mahanuwarin mathara bala dhawanaya wu dumriye riyaduru mahatha, siya dumriya athulu magin bera ganimata, labunu anada nothaka, dumriya aapasu dhawanaya kaleya..
janathawata dun porondu saha ohuge deshapalanaya dekak wiya.
dan thathwaya wenas welada .
ee anuwa wisheshagnya upades osse me katayuthu sidukirimata rajayak lesa adahas karana bawa da janadhipathiwaraya kiya.
wideshikayek amarikawe paraka yaddi chen eka kadagena aapu ballek sellam kara kara hitapu lamayekwa peralagena hapanna patan gaththalu.
untath mawamayi penune bara aduyi ussanna puluwan lesiyen kiyala...
thawa malu karayo, aah...waraduna malu yaluwo dethun denekuth ekkanma ennan.
amma lamaya balanda yanda yojana kala.
dewiyange namayen mewani papathara karyayan sidu kirimata ma manushya lokaye jiwathwa sitina thuru ida nodena bawa da awadharanaya karannemi.
ape podi daruwan balaganne kawda?
ek rathriyaka ehi dhiwarayek puduma upadawana sihinayak dutuweya.
me thaththwaya thula parshawiya bhawayata pathwi katayuthu kirima nusudusu bawa ohuge adahasa we.
me hethuwen aya dadilesa asaranawa sita athi athara wides madhya wartha karanne chithrapata nishpadakayeku wana ashok pandith ayage waidya prathikara sandaha awashya mudal labadi athi bawayi.
ee awasthawa kawadawath amathaka wenne naha.
panduru madiyan thama isgedi awasthawa gatha karanne biththara thulaya.
thawada mewani sthulabhawayen pelena boho ayage husma ganima nirogi nowana bawada, rathriyata adhika lesa gorawana kenek wime sambhawithawada itha ihala bawada peni yayi .
tha masa thunakin enna.
meka sudu karapati robariyak ; mama kamathiyi mankolla karayan saha aparadhakara yange muhunu balagena kiyanna – anura kumara disanayaka (jawipe)
